SEARCH

Package main.java.optimizers

package main.java.optimizers
Provides classes of various optimizers for optimizing the loss function.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    main.java
    Provides packages classes for building neural networks and training them on data.
    main.java.autograd
    Provides the classes needed for automatic differentiation.
    main.java.datasets
    Provides classes for working with datasets.
    main.java.mathematics
    Provides classes of mathematical objects and operations on them.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Adam
    Implements the Adam optimization algorithm, which computes adaptive learning rates for each parameter.
    Momentum
    Implements the Momentum optimization algorithm, which helps accelerate SGD in the relevant direction and dampens oscillations.
    Optimizer
    Abstract class representing an optimizer for neural network training.
    SGD
    Implements the Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) optimization algorithm.
